movie.title: Blade Runner 2049
movie.plot: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.
movie.actors: Ryan Gosling, Ana de Armas, Harrison Ford, Dave Bautista

movie.title: Predators
movie.plot: A group of elite warriors parachute into an unfamiliar jungle and are hunted by members of a merciless alien race.
movie.actors: Adrien Brody, Laurence Fishburne, Danny Trejo

movie.title: TRON: Legacy
movie.plot: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.
movie.actors: Jeff Bridges, Garrett Hedlund, Olivia Wilde

movie.title: Oxygen
movie.plot: A woman wakes in a cryogenic chamber with no recollection of how she got there. As she's running out of oxygen, she must rebuild her memory to find a way out of her nightmare.
movie.actors: Mélanie Laurent

movie.title: Thor: Ragnarok
movie.plot: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.
movie.actors: Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett

movie.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movie.plot: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.
movie.actors: Tom Hardy, Charlize Theron, Nicholas Hoult

movie.title: Godzilla
movie.plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.
movie.actors: Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Elizabeth Olsen, Bryan Cranston

movie.title: Love, Death & Robots: Vol.2
movie.plot: A collection of animated short stories that span various genres including science fiction, fantasy, horror and comedy.
movie.actors: Peter Franzén

movie.title: Blood Machines
movie.plot: An artificial intelligence escapes her spaceship to turn into a female ghost and challenges two blade runners to a galactic chase.
movie.actors: Elisa Lasowski, Anders Heinrichsen, Christian Erickson

movie.title: Avatar
movie.plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
movie.actors: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver

movie.title: The Intouchables
movie.plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.
movie.actors: François Cluzet, Omar Sy, Audrey Fleurot

movie.plot: When both he and a colleague are about to lose their job, Walter takes action by embarking on an adventure more extraordinary than anything he could have ever imagined.
movie.actors: Ben Stiller, Kristen Wiig, Sean Penn

movie.title: Life
movie.plot: A team of scientists aboard the International Space Station discover a rapidly evolving life form that caused extinction on Mars and now threatens all life on Earth.
movie.actors: Jake Gyllenhaal, Rebecca Ferguson, Ryan Reynolds

movie.title: Prometheus
movie.plot: Following clues to the origin of mankind, a team finds a structure on a distant moon, but they soon realize they are not alone.
movie.actors: Noomi Rapace, Logan Marshall-Green, Michael Fassbender

movie.title: Edge of Tomorrow
movie.plot: A soldier fighting aliens gets to relive the same day over and over again, the day restarting every time he dies.
movie.actors: Tom Cruise, Emily Blunt,

movie.title: The Martian
movie.plot: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue.
movie.actors: Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig

movie.title: District 9

movie.actors: Sharlto Copley, David James, Jason Cope

movie.title: Doom

movie.actors: Karl Urban, Rosamund Pike, Dwayne Johnson

movie.title: Annihilation
movie.plot: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition into a mysterious zone where the laws of nature don't apply.

movie.title: Gravity
movie.plot: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.
movie.actors: Sandra Bullock, George Clooney, Ed Harris

movie.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movie.plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
movie.actors: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom

movie.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movie.plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
movie.actors: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen

movie.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

movie.actors: Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen

movie.actors: Martin Freeman, Ian McKellen, Richard Armitage

movie.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
movie.plot: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.
movie.actors: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage

movie.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
movie.plot: Bilbo and company are forced to engage in a war against an array of combatants and keep the Lonely Mountain from falling into the hands of a rising darkness.
movie.actors: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage

movie.title: Forrest Gump

movie.actors: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise

movie.title: Inception

movie.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page

movie.title: The Matrix

movie.actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Thomas Bo Larsen, Annika Wedderkopp

movie.title: Lamb
movie.plot: A childless couple, María and Ingvar discover a mysterious newborn on their farm in Iceland. The unexpected prospect of family life brings them much joy, before ultimately destroying them.

movie.title: Armageddon
movie.plot: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, NASA recruits a misfit team of deep-core drillers to save the planet.
movie.actors: Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton, Ben Affleck

movie.title: Stranger Things
movie.plot: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.
